sentence.Network_en: Any number to the power of nought is equal to one.
Sales rose by nought point four per cent last month.
Numerous attempts to persuade him to write his memoirs came to nought.
sentence.Network_cn: 无数次劝他写回忆录的尝试均以失败告终。

example.ex: Sales rose by nought point four per cent last month...
Houses are graded from nought to ten for energy efficiency...
example.tran: 房屋按照能耗标准划分为0至10级。

entry.def: If you try to do something but your efforts are not successful, you can say that your efforts come to nought .

example.ex: Numerous attempts to persuade him to write his memoirs came to nought.
example.tran: 无数次劝他写回忆录的尝试均以失败告终。

means.word_mean: 1. a mathematical element that when added to another number yields the same number

sentences.en: Using binary notation is in fact just manipulating ones and noughts.
